title: Badfinger THE VERY BEST OF...(2000 issue)
description:
As promised...a .FLAC rip of this (2000) compilation.......widely available

in LOSSY elsewhere.



The lore of Badfinger reads like a Greek tragedy


In less than 10 years this band created several of the greatest (IMO) rock

tunes ever.


In the shadow of the BEATLES and exploited by the management, this quartet:

PETE HAM, TOM EVANS, JOEY MOLLAND, and MIKE GIBBINS did what they obviously

loved to do.  Like the KINKS, they missed out on the credit they so rightly

deserved.  Rightness is in severely short supply presently.


What strikes me like a meteorite is the consistent high quality of most

Badfinger songs.  The only dubious tune in this compilation (once again IMO)

is track #5 MAYBE TOMORROW, but I only know what I like.
